# Class RemoteSTTNode

Remote STT (Speech-to-Text) node for audio transcription. You can either use a pre-configured STT component that could be reused across multiple nodes or provide STT configuration, and the node will create a new component for you.

#### Input

[AudioData](./common_data_types_external_audio_data.AudioData) \- The data type that STTNode accepts as input

#### Output

[TextData](./common_data_types_external_text_data.TextData) \- The data type that STTNode accepts as output

#### Example


```
// Using provider configurationconst sttNode = new RemoteSTTNode(&#123;  id: 'my-stt-node',  sttConfig: &#123; language: &#123; lang: 'en', locale: 'US' &#125; &#125;&#125;);// Using existing STT componentconst sttNodeWithComponent = new RemoteSTTNode(&#123;  id: 'my-stt-node',  sttComponent: existingSTTComponent&#125;);

```

constructor

### Methods

toGraphConfigNode

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new RemoteSTTNode(  
props?: RemoteSTTNodeProps | RemoteSTTNodeWithComponentProps,  
): [RemoteSTTNode]()

Creates a new RemoteSTTNode instance.

#### Parameters

    * `Optional`props: RemoteSTTNodeProps | RemoteSTTNodeWithComponentProps

Configuration for the STT node. Can specify either STT settings or reference an existing STT component.

#### Returns [RemoteSTTNode]()

Overrides AbstractNode.constructor

### `Protected`toGraphConfigNode

  * toGraphConfigNode(): [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)

Converts the STT node to a graph configuration node.

#### Returns [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)

The configured STT node for graph execution

Overrides AbstractNode.toGraphConfigNode
